organization.name: Belarus State Agrarian Technical Univ., Minsk (Belarus)

person.name: Raketskij, P.P., Belarus State Agrarian Technical Univ., Minsk (Belarus)
Shejko, I.P., National Academy of Sciences. Scientific and Practical Center of Animal Breeding (Belarus). Institute for Fish Industry

abstract.value: In course of the research there were studied aspects of breeding work in dairy farming in the conditions of the Republic of Belarus. As a result of realized research there were revealed the principles and methods of dairy cattle breeding. Big factual material on the organization of breeding work with brood stock was generalized, practical techniques in the selection process for improving cattle were recommended. There were considered such questions as genetic basis of breeding cattle; genetic and statistical analysis of quantitative characters; genetic aspects of determining value of animal breeding, genetics of quantitative, selection and genetic parameters of economically useful signs of dairy cattle of Belarus; basis of selection elements (selection, selection of directed rearing); evaluation and selection of cattle; principles and methods of selection of parental pairs, the direction of rearing, methods of forecasting of the selection effect; breeding system works of active population; foreign experience of dairy cattle genetic potential increase; characteristics of active population of dairy cattle; main breeding operation to improve population of black and white cattle; breeding planning.
